statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SystemName , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.TSystem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.SystemName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TSystem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSystem ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, SystemName, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #SystemName#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TSystem SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, SystemName = #SystemName# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
